CustomField.description: This setting allows us to selective disable Dealmaker triggers should that be required. The value of this field should be a comma separated list of trigger names. This field should only be used by TAS group administrators
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting allows us to selective disable Dealmaker triggers should that be required. The value of this field should be a comma separated list of trigger names. This field should only be used by TAS group administrators
CustomField.label: Disabled Trigger List
